code: var BASE_URL="https://api.coinpaprika.com/v1";var NEW_URL="https://ohlcv-api.nomadcoders.workers.dev";export function fetchCoins(){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/coins")).then(function(response){return response.json();});}export function fetchCoinInfo(coinId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/coins/").concat(coinId)).then(function(response){return response.json();});}export function fetchCoinTickers(coinId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/tickers/").concat(coinId)).then(function(response){return response.json();});}export function fetchCoinHistory(coinId){return fetch("".concat(NEW_URL,"?coinId=").concat(coinId)).then(function(response){return response.json();});}
